title: PAKO - Car Chase Simulator
description:
PAKO is a car chase highscore hunt. Escape the cops and avoid obstacles as long as possible. Levels differ to each other and have bonus elements like zombies and tanks.

Game mechanics are super simple, two button controls with fast restart. No learning time, no tutorial, no unnecessary settings to tweak when you just want to play a round. PAKO literally cuts to the chase.

FEATURES
- Change camera view in the Pause menu
- Tons of vehicles with different handling !
- Various locations
- Use dummy character to enter hidden vehicles in Airport level
- Earn credits by playing and watching ads
- Google Cloud saving. Game uses autosave in game menus when logged in to Google Play. Load previously saved game manually in the Settings: Cloud save
- Online highscore lists
- Achievements 
- Adrenaline pumping soundtrack by DKSTR  
- Pakocalypse mode for experienced players: meteors, zombies, tanks and chaos in all levels + shooting mechanics to defend your car from close hits
- FREE with ads: Video ads also give you game credits
- Intel x86 mobile devices supported

FOLLOW US
http://facebook.com/pakoTMG 
http://twitter.com/treemengames
descriptionHTML:
PAKO is a car chase highscore hunt. Escape the cops and avoid obstacles as long as possible. Levels differ to each other and have bonus elements like zombies and tanks.

Game mechanics are super simple, two button controls with fast restart. No learning time, no tutorial, no unnecessary settings to tweak when you just want to play a round. PAKO literally cuts to the chase.

FEATURES
- Change camera view in the Pause menu
- Tons of vehicles with different handling !
- Various locations
- Use dummy character to enter hidden vehicles in Airport level
- Earn credits by playing and watching ads
- Google Cloud saving. Game uses autosave in game menus when logged in to Google Play. Load previously saved game manually in the Settings: Cloud save
- Online highscore lists
- Achievements
- Adrenaline pumping soundtrack by DKSTR
- Pakocalypse mode for experienced players: meteors, zombies, tanks and chaos in all levels + shooting mechanics to defend your car from close hits
- FREE with ads: Video ads also give you game credits
- Intel x86 mobile devices supported

FOLLOW US
http://facebook.com/pakoTMG
http://twitter.com/treemengames
summary: Closed area. No Escape. How long would you last? Welcome to PAKO.

comments: Started on ios, liked all 3 a lot at first but the enemies come @ u to often off screen right in front of u with no time 2 really react. This android version has ads that can't b removed. I don't care about getting credits, what happens when I don't need/want them? Ads, that's what happens, no thanks considering the games don't last more than a minute on average! I paid $6 total on all 3 ios version's 2 support the dev, but the continued o.p of the Ai ruins ALL versions on both platforms! SMH

Great simple and addictive... I have played Pako Forever and really enjoyed it so I got this as well, even better that you can now change views and more maps to play on, a bit harder but that doesn't stop me from playing it.
Want to try but app "stops" consistently before being able to start playing at all.
Decent game but ads cover pause button, and most of the top of the screen
The game is great, huge fun and miles better than the 2nd game.

title: Racing Car Driving Simulator
description:
Racing Car Driving Simulator is the best car simulator of 2014, thanks to its advanced real physics engine 
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free! 
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!

Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city! Try to disable all assists and drift and drag!

GAME FEATURES
------------------------------------------
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
Explore a detailed open world environment.
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate physics.
Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
Several different cameras.

title: CSR Classics
description:
FROM THE MAKERS OF CSR RACING! Drag-strip legends from the last 60 years come to life in CSR Classics.

RACE OVER 50 OF THE GREATEST CARS EVER MADE including the Shelby Mustang GT500, Ford GT40, Plymouth Superbird and other classic models from BMW, Chevrolet, Dodge, Ford, Mercedes, Plymouth, Pontiac, Shelby and more!

RESTORE YOUR RIDE and transform your cars from rusty unloved shells into gorgeous icons of driving!

CLASH OF THE TITANS! - Cobra vs. Mercedes 300SL, Dodge Superbee vs. Chevrolet Camaro, Ford Mustang vs. Skyline GT-R!

OWN THE CITY THAT NEVER SLEEPS

Take on the gangs that own the city and face off against the toughest drivers out there. Have you got what it takes to own the streets?

Requires 1GB of RAM and Android OS 4.0 and above.

PLEASE NOTE! CSR Classics is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

To prevent unauthorised purchases, select "Set or Change PIN" from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the "Use PIN for Purchases" option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

CSR Classics is published by NaturalMotion Games.

WHY NOT TRY CSR RACING 2 ‚Äì The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.naturalmotion.customstreetracer2&hl=en_GB

Meet other players and find out more about CSR:
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/CSRRacingGame
Twitter: @CSRRacing (http://twitter.com/CSRRacing)
Instagram: http://instagram.com/CSRRacingGame

comments: I have had this game on several different phones. I got a notification awhile ago about CSR not providing support for this game anymore because they essentially combined it with CSR2. If you want this game still, go ahead and download, but be aware, if you delete it or lose your phone, you will lose all progress and no way to recover it. So since there is no support or online play, I had friends get into the coding. Now I have unlimited gold and cash. Almost at 100% completion.

It is a great game! I love the cars that you get and hot rods and how you can restore your car, upgrade the tires and rims, upgrade nitro AND.... beat people in races. Which is how you can upgrade from tier one to tier two to three to four to five! That's how you get more cars and more tiers. And it has great graphics.

The old classic cars are great and all, but... The difficulty level of this game is way too high. I've been playing this game for several months now, and I'm only on tier 3! It takes an extremely long time to gather money from races. Not to mention I upgraded my T3 car 2-3 times now, and the difficulty of the races has not decreased at all, forcing me to race regulation races more. CSR 2 is way easier! Shifting also seems to be way more difficult than it should be!

I love this game! I've been playing for a long time now off and on, and it's one I keep coming back to. However, this last time I downloaded it, it's been acting glitchy (weird word coloring and such), and it syncs to my google play account but I lost EVERYTHING. It stinks, because I had some serious time put into it, but I'll just get to do it over now. Only reason is not 5 stars is because I lost everything and I'm still in the salty stage. Keep going developers! We need more games like this!

The gameplay is fun, but the difficulty rating could use some work; you could have a perfect race and still lose when the difficulty is only rated as challenging. Apart from underrated difficulty, the game is well polished, with a well designed racing system.

title: Pixel Car Racer

comments: Love it! The amount of combinations that you can do with your car is (almost) unlimited! There are a few add-ons I would like to see in the game; first, DEFINITELY a multiplayer mode, with Drag, Street, CTF (Capture The Flag), Touge, and Tournaments modified for Multiplayer. And Second, please be able to make an ONLINE shop or an auction for players. This would make the game overall even better. Thanks for making this amazing game! üòâüëç

This game is incredible. I love it, and my girlfriend and I play it almost daily. The controls are simple, yet effective. The tuning is super easy and it's not hard to pick up on how a car is supposed to handle. I would like to see more trucks and SUVs in the game, those would be fun to build. Pretty much the only thing I'm not a fan of are the engine sounds. Particularly how any V8 with a supercharger sounds like a whiny inline 4. Deeper, growling sounds would be awesome. Thanks.

This game is incredible. I absolutely love it and have nearly 30 hours played. The reason I give it 3 stars is because they don't update it. No new features, no new modes. Nothings. The game is good but there is always room for Improvements. As someone who plays this alot I'd like to see the developers try to constantly improve it. And they do not do this. As of the date I wrote this, March 5th 2020 this game has not been updated since January of 2019. Well over a year.

The game is amazing the variety in cars all the upgrades and customization name it and this game has it except for some cars they didn't add ex: any lambo, any Ferrari, any porsche I heard there was one and an AI in a race had one but that won't have it lose a star but please add some of these cars :) oh and can we Please get more car space I feel like 6 isn't enough

The daily reward system is broken. I claimed my daily reward which was 8 spins. Then I turn off the game because I couldn't spin the wheel. When the game was on and I went to spin the wheel it told me I had 0 spins. Overall this is an awesome game, just please fix the daily rewards

title: Racing in City - Car Driving
description:
Are you ready to download the most fun in car city racing 3D game for free?  

‚ÄúRacing in City‚Äù is the best endless car driving game in the traffic. Unlike the other racing in car games, you can customise or upgrade your car. While in the city traffic driving, to get better points, you either need to speed up or pass other traffic cars closely. Racing in car has never been that much fun before. Hold the steering wheel right now and enjoy city driving. A different kind of racing game is waiting for you.

13 DIFFERENT RACING CARS 
2 Hatchbacks, 9 sedans and 2 offroad vehicles are ready for city car driving game!

MISSIONS
Complete all the missions and prove that you are a pro driver.  

2 DIFFERENT CONTROL OPTIONS 
You can enjoy city driving either using tilt control or steering wheel. In addition, you can switch on/off auto speed option for eliminating the gas pedal.

WORLD SCORE LEADERBOARD 
How qualified you are as a traffic racer? Through leaderboards of the levels, compete your driving in car skills with others while city car racing.

CUSTOMISATION 
You can customize city cars in a way you like by changing color of the car and rims. You can also add spoiler to your car if you like. In addition, you can change colors of spoiler, rims, calipers separately. With these customization features, you can create your dream modified car.

ENGINE TUNING 
You can tune your vehicle engine by customizing speed, brake distance, acceleration and steering values of each vehicle. 

MANY OTHER FEATURES 
5 different maps offering different city car driving experience, 5 different game modes including one-way, two-way traffic, free and time attack modes. 

Are your ready to try one of the best in car driving games ever? A

You can follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/hammurabigames/

title: City Car Driving
description:
City Car Driving is the most realistic car simulator in Google Play !!
Are you ready to develop your driving skills? Now you can get it for free !!!
Feel free to play any mode, Career, Checkpoint, Drift or Free mode. Earn points and get more car...
Earn more points and personalize your car.

HOW TO PLAY?

- Career Mode -
* Follow the yellow arrows
* When there is direction arrow, use your signal before turning to get more Points
* Dont run a red light
* Park your car to the green area

- Checkpoint Mode -
* Collect all checkpoints in given time

- Drift Mode -
* Just drift in given time


GAME FEATURES

- Extreme car physics and environment
- 3 Control option , tilt, steering or arrow keys
- Different camera angles including Interior View !!
- 11 cars with 8 rims and 8 colours
- Realistic traffic simulation
- Traffic lights
- Signals

title: GTR Traffic Rivals
description:
GTR Traffic Rivals is dedicated to spectacular and exciting races with an endless arcade mode. You will find great graphics, lots of cars, realistic physics of cars on the highway and several game modes, among which everyone will find the most suitable for themselves.

Traffic Modes: 
‚òÖ For the first crash
Mode in which you can‚Äôt crash, a collision with someone else's machine will lead to defeat.

‚òÖ For the first collision with the oncoming traffic 
Oncoming traffic is moving very fast, be careful when you changing lanes.

‚òÖ Time mode 
Time goes by, you need to hold out as long as possible on the highway traffic.

‚òÖ Time mode with the oncoming traffic 
The most difficult mode. Lanes are so small, and cars are moving very fast, in addition time is running out!

‚òÖ Tournaments 
Compete against other players, the winner is the one who gets more points in a minute of driving on the highway.

‚òÖ Contracts 
Send your cars for mission (for example, borrow a car for the stars), and with some odds you will get a reward!

TRAFFIC FEATURES: 
‚ùÇ 33 detailed supercars 
The game has a large choice of machines of different brands, from Porsche, Ferrari to Subaru and Mustang;

‚ùÇ Racing career 
Build a racer career on the highway, pass the levels, with each level it becomes more and more difficult to play;

‚ùÇ Police on the road 
The police will appear at the most inopportune moment, you have to get away from the police as quickly as possible!

‚ùÇ Global Leaderboard 
Fight for a place in the global results charts with other players;

‚ùÇ Nitro 
Use car acceleration to quickly achieve the goal!

descriptionHTML:
GTR Traffic Rivals is dedicated to spectacular and exciting races with an endless arcade mode. You will find great graphics, lots of cars, realistic physics of cars on the highway and several game modes, among which everyone will find the most suitable for themselves.

Traffic Modes:
‚òÖ For the first crash
Mode in which you can‚Äôt crash, a collision with someone else's machine will lead to defeat.

‚òÖ For the first collision with the oncoming traffic
Oncoming traffic is moving very fast, be careful when you changing lanes.

‚òÖ Time mode
Time goes by, you need to hold out as long as possible on the highway traffic.

‚òÖ Time mode with the oncoming traffic
The most difficult mode. Lanes are so small, and cars are moving very fast, in addition time is running out!

‚òÖ Tournaments
Compete against other players, the winner is the one who gets more points in a minute of driving on the highway.

‚òÖ Contracts
Send your cars for mission (for example, borrow a car for the stars), and with some odds you will get a reward!

TRAFFIC FEATURES:
‚ùÇ 33 detailed supercars
The game has a large choice of machines of different brands, from Porsche, Ferrari to Subaru and Mustang;

‚ùÇ Racing career
Build a racer career on the highway, pass the levels, with each level it becomes more and more difficult to play;

‚ùÇ Police on the road
The police will appear at the most inopportune moment, you have to get away from the police as quickly as possible!

‚ùÇ Global Leaderboard
Fight for a place in the global results charts with other players;

‚ùÇ Nitro
Use car acceleration to quickly achieve the goal!

‚ùÇ Combo racing
Overtake as many cars as possible, he combo works under one condition - you must to drive very close to other cars.

DEAR USERS! We constantly read your feedbacks and suggestions, and try to respond to them on time. We are also pleased with the constructive suggestions for improving our games. All your suggestions we take into account and discuss.

https://www.facebook.com/gtrtrafficrivals

title: Extreme Car Driving Racing 3D
description:
Extreme Car Driving Racing 3D Simulator is the best car simulator of 2014, thanks to its advanced real physics engine.
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free! 
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed with police cars chasing you! 
Don't let cops chase you or you will be arrested!

Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city!

ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!

Several different cameras.

title: Unblock Car
description:
Unblock Car is the most popular sliding block puzzle game in Google Play. The goal of this game is to get a red car out of a six-by-six grid full of automobiles by moving the other vehicles out of its way.

We human clans spend one fourth of our lives ineffectually migrating to undesirable destinations (that is, stuck in traffic jam during rush hour). Make the most of this time with this amazing Unblock Car game. Designed to develop sequential-thinking for impulsive brains, we offered more than 3,000 puzzles for you to clash. However the cars and trucks obstruct the path which makes the puzzle harder.

How to Play:
You need to get the Red Car out the Exit Gate. To accomplish, just move the blocking vehicles out of the way.

Game Features:
- 4 difficulty levels with 3,000 puzzles and more to come
- 4 different visually striking ice board themes
- Hint/Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
- Keep track of all the puzzles you've cleared
- Quick and easy Tutorial

title: Blocky Roads
description:
Jump into your car and discover green hills, snowy mountains and desert dunes in this unique physics racer!
The tornado ripped your farm apart and scattered it around the Globe. Collect the missing parts to restore the farm to its former glory!

3d racing against your own times in a blocky mining world!

**Choose one of the 9 cars or build your own block by block! The car editor unlocks after track 3 is finished!**

Main Features:

- 3d racing - Blocky style!
- 12 tracks to conquer
- 4 challenge tracks to test your skills
- 9 awesome vehicles : trucks, bikes, Monster trucks, tanks
- Customizable character
- Car Editor! Build and Paint Your own car block by block!
(Unlocks after track 3 is finished)
- Beautiful Voxel Graphics
- GameServices achievements and leaderboards
- Kids will love it

Follow us for the latest info and game news!

title: Overdrive City ‚Äì Car Tycoon Game
description:
Build the car town of your dreams in Overdrive City! Manufacture fleets of vehicles, collect a variety of iconic cars, and compete in a challenging racing career mode. Grow your tycoon city to become a global motorsport enterprise and the top race champion!

BUILD AND COLLECT YOUR FAVORITE CARS
‚Ä¢ Manufacture 50+ famous car models from Lamborghini, Porsche, Ford, and other top brands!

‚Ä¢ Show off your garage of sports cars, classic cars, and supercars to everyone in your town.

‚Ä¢ Produce car parts ranging from steel bolts and carbon fiber to engine blocks and drivetrains.

‚Ä¢ Customize your car with no limits to your creativity! Create a stylized design with the vinyl editor and choose endless paint colors.

‚Ä¢ Upgrade your car to improve top speed and performance on the streets and race tracks.

‚Ä¢ Transport export shipments and manage mechanic repair orders to expand your motorsport business beyond your city.

CREATE THE ULTIMATE CAR TOWN
‚Ä¢ Customize your tycoon city by building dozens of decorative automobile items, including custom streets featuring curvy asphalt raceways.

‚Ä¢ Assemble stunning automobile showrooms in your town to celebrate your passion for cars!

‚Ä¢ Construct numerous car factory buildings, production facilities, and research centers in this city builder simulator.

BECOME A RACE CHAMPION
‚Ä¢ Satisfy your need for speed as a race car driver by experiencing fun, real racing within a city builder game!

‚Ä¢ Put the pedal to the metal in a 6-chapter racing career mode with over 60 races and then burnout on the asphalt in racing trials featuring 1,000+ extra races.

‚Ä¢ Tap your way to success by earning the fastest lap times in your car, beating the rest of the competition, and becoming the best racer in the world.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
‚Ä¢ Trade cars and automobile parts with your motor city friends to optimize factory production in your car town.

‚Ä¢ Visit a friend‚Äôs town to see their top cars and explore their city builder progress!

‚Ä¢ Play competitive racing events! Climb the leaderboards to earn unique rewards for your town and cars.

REAL LICENCED CARS
Drive off the production line with these top licensed cars, add them to your car maker town, upgrade them with your garage mechanic, and compete in tap racing:
‚Ä¢ Lamborghini Murci√©lago (2002)
‚Ä¢ Ford Mustang GT (1968)
‚Ä¢ Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VIII (2004)
‚Ä¢ Chevrolet Corvette Stingray (1963)
‚Ä¢ Nissan Skyline 72 (1972)
‚Ä¢ Porsche 718 Cayman (2018)
‚Ä¢ BMW M2 (2018)
‚Ä¢ Subaru WRX STI (2018)
‚Ä¢ ... and more!

There are tons of other famous cars that are also ready to be collected! Have fun building them all and then drive them from the streets of your car town to the challenging racing tracks!

Do you enjoy building the best cars, being the manager of a car factory production line, or turning your car town into the ultimate racing city? Go beyond idle gameplay at a junkyard or farm -- drive to the start line, rev your motor, and start tap racing today! Overdrive City is a car maker and city builder game for fans of car games, city building games, tycoon simulator games, car mechanic simulator games, race manager games, and racing games!

comments: This game is pretty fun, but on a poor Internet connection it is full of bugs. Races take multiple tries to enter, jobs and upgrades takes resources but don't give anything back and to top it off some currency disappeared overnight. Literally, I had a bit over 50 cash, woke up to 30. A game this unstable can't get many stars.

I like the idea of the app and it's neat in all however it's really hard to follow and fyi not every vehicle is Rwd. The starting car is a passat and according to the game it's rwd. In a race I saw a fiesta st doing a burnout from the start and the rear tires were spinning. Like what? This isn't how that works.. yall need to learn more about cars before making a game mainly focused on cars and maintenance

I've read some of the reviews this a fun game to play but the wait times for some of the parts is ridiculous, I can understand the times for the smallers parts but 6 hours for a muffler and 5 hours for suspension coilovers. Overall fun game but times need to be shortened. If the times were shortened I might change my review and star rating.

Game needs work, start by listening to people that enjoy the game, but still left. The force of grind is too much. A game shouldn't feel like a job, it takes the fun out of it. Making people build parts to service cars just to be able to race is too much. Put the race keys on a time based refill and leave the car service station for money and the parts building for upgrades and service for cash. The races for car cards is fine. If they enjoy they will spend money, don't force them to.

Slightly better than most of the low effort moneygrabs that are city builder MMOs nowadays. It does push you to spend money incredibly often, and it's a slight grind without. One big thing that Gameloft did correct is making a large portion of decorations buyable with the ingame coins, not the cash. Also has the fascinating reality where every car is RWD. I'm not complaining, but it's pretty awesome seeing a RWD Sentra and Eclipse, as well as a LHD hakosuka skyline. Decent overall.

recentChanges:
Take the Wheel!

You asked, we listened! Tilt controls are here, putting the steering directly in your hands.
comments: Good game, but a money grab again! The game play is fun, easy to pick up, the graphics are nice and smooth. My main problem with this game is you only get 8 races before your fuel is gone, requiring you to watch a video üòï ok, or pay üò°. This wouldn't be a problem if the races were longer and the bonuses better, but leveling up takes for ever or costs a fortune, not a good mix.

This is a good game with the potential of becoming a great game. It needs more energy, more excitement, more oomph. Give us longer and more challenging tracks with more intense water splashes, road hazards, night and day, rain (even tornadoes), jumps. Just don't be too safe with this game. So take a few risks and make it more varied and exciting, please. Please scrap the notion that you can get a car that you already own via the silver and gold crates. I know you can sell the car but it's silly

Because of the enjoyment factor of this game, I will change my review to 5 stars. However the development team should know that I have already beat the game almost 2 weeks ago and I still have NO stage 5 and 6 engine resource parts from rewards randomly given during gameplay. Most are duplicates. More tracks would be nice, maybe famous ones? No game is perfect, this one is close. Other than that, it is a very well balanced and very fun addictive game to play! Thank you development team :)

This is a very good game however races are extremely short and you dont get much money. There should be this system where every like 3 or 5 races your money from a race is multiplied my like x1.5 its also this game dosent take up much storage which i like alot the game also looks very good and controls are smooth. Thank you developer team for coding and just creating this game in general :) Have a nice day (edit there is also a great selection of cars and modifications)

A truly great game. The only problems I have with the game is that when participating in a race with multiple other cars, it is impossible to drift corners without hitting another car. Another thing is the cars themselves. There aren't many to choose from and there is no variety. You would expect a game like this to have a Supra or some SRT cars but to my suprise all these were absent from the game. In all honesty it is a great alternative to the ever so stingy EA's Need For Speed: No Limits.

title: Offroad 4x4 Car Driving
description:
Take control of 9 cars and 2 motorbikes in a huge forest and mountain environment : 16 km¬≤ area, 30 km of roads! Accomplish a lot of variety of missions to become a good driver.

!! Offroad car driving Mountain contains 20 levels !!

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
The system of missions is based on popular game play : drive on the map and find one of the 20 spots to launch a mission.
The minimap help you to know where are the missions spots.

The map is very huge, and contains a lot of point of interest. 
Like a cascade and a lake, a japanese temple, a small airport, different houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more... 
The road system are also very dense, from 2x2 lanes, to very small road of montains, with hill climb.

Example of missions :
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Drive quickly without hitting the boars
- Emergency intervention and rescue the victims
- Follow your friends through the forest with your 4X4 and SUV
- Use your truck to remove all the objects present on the road
- Catch all the gangsters before they escape
- Finish the course as fast as possible

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains and forests
- Realistic driving simulator
- Realistic physics
- High quality 4x4 vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

List of cars : 
- Dudge Raam 4X4
- Aodi A3
- Small Cooper
- Jeep Wringler
- Hammer Alpha 1
- Corevete TR1
- Ferary 455 Italia
- Shuzuki MotorBike GSX650F
- Yamahaha 350

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

title: Multi Level Car Parking Games
description:
Drifting‚Ä¶ Parking‚Ä¶ Precision Driving. Who said shopping was boring? Drive intense cars around the car parking lot to pass the missions in the fastest time you can.

Truly taking Parking into Three Dimensions! If you love Parking games, you haven‚Äôt seen anything like this before! Park on MULTIPLE FLOORS of the realistic multistory car park facility and don‚Äôt crash into the other cars which also trying to find their parking spaces!!

Real moving traffic to avoid and UNIQUE and FUN cars to drive:
** Weave like a Ninja in the small but QUICK Hatchback
** Carefully negotiate the turns in the HUGE Luxury sedan
** Drift like a Street Racer with the DRIFT Muscle Car!
** The bulky 4x4 SUV is a bit of a monster to navigate around the parked cars!
** Hot Hatchbak - shorter doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean easier! This tuned-up hatchback has a lot of power to tame!
** Luxury Sedan - this very long car will test your spatial awareness. Don‚Äôt scratch the shiny paintwork!

Tons of varied missions, featuring moving traffic to avoid, moving entry and exit barriers and a detailed multi-level car park map to explore.

Drive through a series of increasingly difficult parking tasks designed to challenge the best of drivers, all 100% free-to-play!

* * * * *
GAME FEATURES
:arrow_forward: Drive 3 totally different realistic Multi Level Car Park maps with active traffic!
‚ñ∂ Challenging levels to push your Parking Skill to the limit!
‚ñ∂ 100% free-to-play
‚ñ∂ Customisable control methods (tilt, buttons, wheel)
‚ñ∂ Multiple views (including drivers-eye bonnet-cam view)

* * * * *
So, if you love Parking games you will LOVE this game. If you HATE parking in multistory car parks, take your anger out on this game and you will still Love it!

title: Crash of Cars
description:
Welcome to Crash of Cars, a REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER game where your goal is to collect as many crowns as possible before getting destroyed.
 
Collect power-ups, destroy other players, steal their crowns, and climb the leaderboards!
 
KEY FEATURES:
- 8 Maps to enjoy REAL TIME Multiplayer battles
- 70+ unlockable cars across 4 different rarities (Common, Rare, Epic, Legendary)
- 30+ Skins to customise your cars with. Pepperoni Skin on the Camper Van is quite a tasty choice.
- 16 Upgradable Power-Ups, including a flamethrower, cannon, trebuchet, and more.
- Play with Friends feature. There‚Äôs nothing more fun than destroying your friends :)
- Mission System
- Hourly Leaderboard and Google Play Game Services support
- Single Player mode also available
- New Content Coming Soon!
 
From the publishers of Earn to Die. If you enjoy .io style online multiplayer games or fast-paced PVP action, be sure to download now!

Required Permissions FAQ:
WRITE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is required to share animated GIF replays and load/display some ads in game (Crash of Cars is an ad-supported game).

comments: Ok devs. here's the deal. This game is EPIC ok, the gameplay is amazing not to mention the best graphics and it's just amazing I had a lot of fun with this game, but... There is 1 problem that I have been experiencing. The game has been randomly stopping for sometimes and I hope that you can fix it. But other than that it's amazing,you can acquire cars easily (with good luck that is :-D) and I want to suggest 1v1 or 2v2. Tks.

This game has: A lot of cars, good gameplay, not much ads and more! But the only problem i have with the game is when u reach lvl 100 There is not that much to do, to solve this i sugest prestige/rebirths to the game. So this is how it will work, u will reset your progress for bonuses, u can do this how much u want. U will not lose: skins, gems, badges. The bonuses are: a rebirth car (legendary), badge for rebirth, 10% more xp (max 100%),cheeper machines (by 4 coins max 60). U can rebirth at 90

Hi dev's This game is one of the best games I had ever played but I have a problem with my internet and when I play with my friends in custom room matches It automatically leaves And you should also add a symbol which indicates the network strength even ingame And please buff pirate ships (legendary car) power as it is empowered This is it I wish you add all these features to the game Thank you In advance

This is the closest i couls get for a game with Twisted Metal feeling, right on my palm. Controls needs a bit of getting used to, the gameplay is simple and fun, and acquiring new cars is easy as long as you have a good luck. Local multiplayer also works well, an offline option like using Hotspot would be great tho. A very fun game to play, and i love it.

Brilliant game. It's is not too easy or not too hard. There are many challenges and alot of work to be done to get max level and all the cars which is really fun.By the way you need to fix some glitches like when I start a match I sometimes just randomly die without seeing any players in my screen. Other than that I really like it!

title: Car game for toddlers: kids cars racing games
description:
Which kid doesn‚Äôt love cool cars? Especially, when he can create unique cars for the race, drive faster than lightning, and cross obstacles on the road!
 
With this exciting app children can enjoy beeping, accelerating and jumping on trampolines as they ride on different vehicles. For some added fun, the game also includes interactive objects on the way for kids to click. Set off on an exciting journey with a new friend - racer Raccoon!

Features of the app:
‚òÖ Choose from different high-speed cars
‚òÖ Paint or improve your cars in a garage
‚òÖ Paste bright and funny car stickers
‚òÖ Travel to different locations
‚òÖ Enjoy this easy and fun-to-play game
‚òÖ Delight yourself with the funny cartoon graphics
‚òÖ Listen to the stunning sound effects and music
‚òÖ Play without internet
 
This entertaining game is suitable for kids aged 1 year and above. Let your children learn to be creative, attentive and determined, as they play this game!
 
There are many different activities designed to capture toddlers‚Äô attention as they travel around in fancy cars:
- Add improvements like turbo boosters, flashers, sirens, balloons and other accessories
- Paint the car in different attractive colors
- Draw with brushes or use paint cans - it‚Äôs our choice!
- Wash your car with a sponge in a garage
- Choose wheels for your vehicle - small, large, or unusual ones
- Decorate the car with stickers and superhero badges

Have loads of fun with amazing vehicles!

CLASSIC -  Retro car, Pickup, Ice cream truck  and others
MODERN - Police car, Jeep, Ambulance and more
FUTURISTIC - Lunar rover, Flying saucer, Concept car and others
FANTASY -  Monster truck, Superhero machines, Dinosaur and more
CONSTRUCTION - Excavator, Tractor, Concrete mixer truck and others

This adventurous car game is simple, exciting, and educative! That‚Äôs exactly what kids need!

We value your feedback. Did you enjoy this game? Write to us about your experience.

recentChanges:
Make every day a holiday with us! We‚Äôve got an awesome UPDATE for you! Woohoo!

Come and see for yourself!
- 20+ special Halloween and Christmas cars
- Unique and quirky UPGRADES for you
- EXCLUSIVE snowy and spooky roads
- Amazing sleighs and Halloween vehicles
- Plus! Fancy dress costumes for Raccoon!

Download this UPDATE and become Santa Raccoon in his sleigh or spooky Raccoon in his Halloween machine!
comments: I don't usually write reviews but I feel it is important to say that this and the boats game, and possibly others are very similar in concept, animation and play style to another popular kids game (see my boats review.) I'm unsure who copied who but the differences are purely cosmetic. I've had issues with this and the boats game regularly, once new content releases it asks you to pay more money to unlock "all" content. Feels scammy although the game itself is very cute and engaging.

This is really a funny game! My children really enjoy playing with it. Sounds and pictures are funny and they laugh with raccoon's while he is racing and capturing stars. They love the chance of changing colors and each one choose his favourite color, tires and stickers. Even the older one, who is not a toddler, enjoys designing the cars and running. For us, it's really a 5 stars!!!
This game allows child to create their own car and place it in a race. Good game for 3+ years old and especially if they like cars.
It's a fun and creative and colorful game I just wish you could at least get two levels without having to pay.
Great for toddlers! Fun, easy to use!
